alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 2:26PM EST until February 23 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM WEDNESDAY TO 4 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 4 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...From 3 PM Wednesday to 4 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation starts off as a period of snow, heavy at times late Wednesday afternoon. The snow is then forecast to change over to sleet and freezing rain after 10 PM Wednesday evening. Periods of light freezing rain, rain or sleet continue during the day Thursday. Temperatures hover in the mid 20s to lower 30s through the event.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
